attributes.action: Peaceful revolution and just retribution in the banking industry
attributes.additional_details:
'All people recognise the right of revolution: that is, the right to refuse allegiance to, or to resist, the government when its tyranny or its inefficiency are great and unendurable.'

Henry David Thoreau


We the undersigned call for the British Government to initiate a genuine root-and-branch reformist revolution in the banking industry and be seen to punish the wrongdoers in full sight of the whole British population. If the Government's inefficiency is unendurable, then we believe popular resistance is inevitable.
